title: Tim Donaghy: "Personal Foul"
description: A new Netflix documentary. "Untold: Operation Flagrant Foul" looks at an NBA betting scandal from 15 years ago, involving then-referee Tim Donaghy. He wrote the book "Personal Foul: A First-Person Account of the Scandal That Rocked the NBA" and spoke with Michael about it.  Original air date 19 February 2010. The book was published on 27 November 2009.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tim Donaghy, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
